Title: AFH Day 1 – Intro & Part 61E
Notes: Read AFH Ch.1. Skim 61.102–61.103. Make one-page overview of eligibility, tests, and ACS mapping.

Title: AFH Day 2 – Ground Ops & Preflight
Notes: Read AFH Ch.2. Write your own preflight-taxi-shutdown checklist linked to 61.105(b)(7),(13) and 61.107(b)(1)(ii),(xii).

Title: AFH Day 3 – Basic Flight Maneuvers
Notes: Read AFH Ch.3. Summarize four fundamentals, climbs/descents/turns. Connect to ACS basic attitude flying tasks.

Title: AFH Day 4 – Energy Management
Notes: Read AFH Ch.4. Create 5–7 'energy rules' for climb, descent, and pattern that you can brief before each flight.

Title: AFH Day 5 – UPRT, Slow Flight & Stalls
Notes: Study AFH Ch.5 on slow flight, stalls, spins. Map each maneuver to ACS tasks. Practice stall recovery briefing.

Title: AFH Day 6 – Takeoffs & Departure Climbs
Notes: Read AFH Ch.6. Build a takeoff briefing template (normal, short, soft, crosswind) with performance and noise-abatement notes.

Title: AFH Day 7 – Ground Reference Maneuvers
Notes: Read AFH Ch.7. Draw wind diagrams for rectangular course, S-turns, and turns-around-a-point; note common errors.

Title: AFH Day 8 – Patterns & Airport Ops
Notes: Read AFH Ch.8. Create towered vs. non-towered pattern flows (entry, radio, collision avoidance) tied to 61.107(b)(1)(iii).

Title: AFH Day 9 – Approaches & Landings
Notes: Read AFH Ch.9. Make a table of approach/landing types (normal, xwind, short, soft, power-off) with when/how to use them.

Title: AFH Day 10 – Performance Maneuvers
Notes: Read AFH Ch.10. Summarize purpose, setup, and common errors for steep turns, chandelles, and steep spirals.

Title: AFH Day 11 – Night Operations
Notes: Read AFH Ch.11. Review 61.109 night requirements and 61.107(b)(1)(iv). Build night ops checklist.

Title: AFH Day 12 – Emergency Procedures
Notes: Study AFH Ch.18. Build flow-based checklists (engine failure, fire, electrical, off-field landing) linked to your POH.

Title: AFH Day 13 – AFH ↔ 61.105/107/109 Map
Notes: Take 61.105(b) and 61.107(b)(1) and write which AFH chapters support each line. Highlight any gaps to fill later.

Title: AFH Day 14 – Mock Oral & Review
Notes: Use the Quizlet/Anki deck to run a self-oral on AFH+61E+ACS. Capture weak topics as separate TODO list.
